desc: Small-batch stoneware ceramics made in Singapore and inspired by the flavour, texture and smells of good food. Thrown on the wheel, glazed by hand, Eastware ceramics are functional artworks for cosy homes.

layout.text: Small-batch stoneware ceramics handmade in Singapore and inspired by good food. Thrown on the wheel and glazed by hand, Eastfield ceramics are functional artworks for cosy homes.
